message.body: Hello! Is your 2004 still for sale?
And would you be open to showing it tomorrow?
Yes the Subaru is still available you can come to see he car today anytime after 1pm let me know I can text you the address
Great! Is around 6 ok? Do you have the vin number? Thank you! See you tonight.
Yes 6 is fine you can get the vin off the website www.chesapeakemotors.com
Great. My name is Ingrid and I'll bring my boyfriend bc he is a mechanic and his name is Alec. See you this evening!

This is the exact model and year I want, and I've seen a few so far but they had horrible corrosion it really bad transmission slipping issues. If this is in good condition then it is def a sale. See you soon.
